post.description:
Enables login. Default method is token authorization. Support rememberMe functionality. If rememberMe is set to true then token expires in 30 days, otherwise in 24h.

 _app/controllers/auth_controller.ts_ - **login**

Enables registration of admin. After registration admin is logged in and bearer token is generated.

 _app/controllers/auth_controller.ts_ - **register**
